control_status.name: Ensure Security Defaults is enabled on Microsoft Entra ID
Ensure Multi-factor Authentication is Required for All Users
Ensure Multi-factor Authentication is Required for Administrative Roles
Ensure Trusted Locations Are Defined
Ensure Guest Users Are Reviewed on a Regular Basis
Ensure Access Reviews Are Configured for Guest Users
Ensure Self-Service Password Reset Is Enabled
Ensure Custom Banned Password List is Set
Ensure Privileged Identity Management Is Used to Manage Roles
Ensure Global Administrator Count Is Minimized
Ensure Microsoft Defender for Cloud Is Set to On
Ensure Microsoft Defender for Servers Is Set to On
Ensure Microsoft Defender for App Service Is Set to On
Ensure Microsoft Defender for SQL Is Set to On
Ensure Microsoft Defender for Storage Is Set to On
Ensure Microsoft Defender for Key Vault Is Set to On
Ensure Security Contact Email Is Set
Ensure Automatic Provisioning of Monitoring Agent Is Set to On
Ensure Secure Transfer Required Is Set to Enabled
Ensure Storage Account Default Network Access Is Set to Deny
Ensure Private Endpoints Are Used to Access Storage Accounts
Ensure Storage Logging Is Enabled for Blob Service
Ensure Public Access Level Is Disabled for Storage Accounts
Ensure Minimum TLS Version Is Set to 1.2
Ensure Soft Delete Is Enabled for Blobs and Containers
Ensure Auditing Is Set to On for SQL Servers
Ensure Advanced Threat Protection Is Set to On
Ensure SQL Server TDE Is Enabled
Ensure SQL Server Firewall Rules Are Configured
Ensure SQL Server Uses Private Endpoints
Ensure Diagnostic Logs Are Enabled for All Services
Ensure Activity Log Retention Is Set to 365 Days or More
Ensure Log Analytics Workspace Is Configured
Ensure Network Security Group Flow Logs Are Enabled
Ensure Security Alert Notifications Are Configured
Ensure No Network Security Groups Allow Inbound from 0.0.0.0/0 to Port 22
Ensure No Network Security Groups Allow Inbound from 0.0.0.0/0 to Port 3389
Ensure Network Security Groups Are Associated with Subnets
Ensure DDoS Protection Standard Is Enabled
Ensure Web Application Firewall Is Enabled
Ensure Azure Bastion Is Used for Remote Access
Ensure Virtual Machines Use Managed Disks
Ensure VM Disk Encryption Is Enabled
Ensure VMs Do Not Have Public IP Addresses
Ensure Automatic OS Updates Are Enabled
Ensure Key Vault Is Recoverable
Ensure Private Endpoints Are Used for Key Vault
Ensure Key Vault Logging Is Enabled
Ensure Key Expiration Is Set for Keys
Ensure Secret Expiration Is Set for Secrets
Ensure App Service Uses Latest TLS Version
Ensure App Service Requires HTTPS Only
Ensure App Service Uses Managed Identity
Ensure App Service Uses VNet Integration
